resources.string:
Track and Manage training of your Tensorflow and Keras models remotely.

 This app lets you
	1. view model training(s) and related metrics
 	2. manage model training(s)
 	3. terminate (stop) model training remotely

Firstly, make sure that you have added the dl_tracker python-package into your current working directory.

The package can be downloaded from the following link:
 https://github.com/thevarunsharma/dl_tracker

Create a new model in the app by going to "My Models" tab. Copy the model key.

Pass this model key along with your password as parameters to the new dl_tracker.Tracker instance in Python.

While calling fit(or fit_generator) method on the model instance, pass the created Tracker instance in the list of callbacks.
